actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Motion to refer to the Committee on Rules rejected in House, roll call #63 (172-219).

official_title: A resolution inquiring into circumstances surrounding publication by the Village Voice and Daniel Schorr.

summary.text: Directs the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to inquire into the circumstances surrounding the publication of the text and of any part of the report of the Select Committee on Intelligence. Requires a timely report to be made to the House.

titles.title: A resolution inquiring into circumstances surrounding publication by the Village Voice and Daniel Schorr.
